::: Within the network of airvents, the critically damaged MEGATRON scurries 
along. He could see the exit vent into the bridge where the Auto-bots lay 
motionless....now he had to get inside. Glaring into the room, he saw Optimus 
sitting within the command chair. That was his first target. MEGATRON put out 
his left hand to push the vent face away....and suddenly a burst of energy 
shot through him, leaving his left arm dead. ::::

::: MEGATRON ::: Damn alarm!

::: He looked around to see a small control panel. with his gun, he blasted 
it off the wall and crept inside. :::

::: Cautiously he made his way between the giant bots, the the feet of 
Optimus Prime :::

::: MEGATRON ::: Now, my dear enermy, you will die!

::: BLACK ARACNIA, GREMLIN, and JACKLE burst inside :::

::: BLACK ARACNIA shoots the gun out of MEGATRONs hand ::: Hold it lizard 
breath, were not letting you alter time....

::: MEGATRON ::: Argh! No, not this time!

::: GREMLIN and JACKLE begin to fire on MEGATRON :::

::: MEGATRON turns and takes cover in the shadows....secretly he sends a 
transmission to his team to get into he arc and help him :::
